tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My 3 years 9 months old daughter Aaradhya was suffering from multiple tooth cavities and dental carries. I consulted dental clinic at Chennai 10 months before consulting with Dr. Goswami recently. I was very much anxious about future and its treatment of my daughter's dental problem since the dental clinic of Chennai where I visited suggested for a dental surgery of six tooth with general anesthesia. I was seriously scared hearing this solution because of some some serious outcome stories I heard about after carrying out General Anesthesia of child at this age. When I met Dr. Goswami's at Sri Arabinda Sevakendra at Jodhpur Park, Kolkata he assured me that he would carry out the complete dental treatment of my kid with local anesthesia and it won't be required any hospitalization or operation theater. Only thing that he urged was co-operation from the parents. I assured him about every co-operation from my side. With only two sittings he did unbelievable treatment. He did multiple procedures in 9 numbers of tooth ranging from pulpectomy followed by crowing, pulpectomy followed by GIC light cure restoration, GIC composite filling, tooth extraction. After her treatment there was zero complaint other that little swelling for half day. I want to thank to Dr. Abhirup Goswami for his sincere treatment plan, expertise, dedication, punctuality, behavior and total management of intricate invasive dental treatment for little children. He can be totally trusted for one's child's dental problem without hesitation. My good wish and respect for his professionalism will always be there for Dr. Abhirup Goswami.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We went for the treatment of our daughter who is 3 years and 8 months old. She had multiple cavities in her teeth which needed dental fillings. We tried before with some other doctors but they could not even open her mouth. Then we came to know about Dr Abhirup Goswami and the result was just amazing. In a single sitting that too on our first visit,  he did the needful treatment and we were extremely happy with his behaviour too. We would definitely recommend any parents who may look for a dentist for their child (Pododentist).

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Single Sitting,RCT - Root Canal Treatment, Tooth Extraction,Dental Cleaning,
review:
Having done Root Canal from other places both in India & abroad. This was my best experience for Root Canal so far. He extracted a tooth & did 2 root canals in the same day. 
He explained me the entire scenario & is a very patient person. There are advanced instruments in his home clinic with a chair installed x-ray machine. Best part was he played some music during the process & that was very relaxing in that tense environment. Have been very satisfied & happy ** **** **** ********* ***** *** *** **** ******** ** *** *********
reply_text: Thanks a lot Sir for your kind words üòä

tags: None
review: It was serious pain before the treatment. Dr. Goswami treated root canal for my 4 years old kid which was seemed to be impossible for us. It was minimum possible pain in the treatment and the baby was not much husseled. After treatment the pains in teeth are absent now. We would like to thanks Dr. Goswami a lot for his care and concern.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to Dental Care Serampore for multiple Root Canal treatments and replacement of missing teeth. The doctor was very patient and explained me the entire treatment plan. The treatments were absolutely painless and I'm extremely happy. His friendly behaviour and excellent clinical hand is appreciable. Also his clinic is very well maintained with all modern equipments along with sterilisation protocols. I strongly recommend Dr. Abhirup Goswami for any kind of dental treatments.
reply_text: Thank you so much mam for your kind words

tags: None
review: I'm in modelling fraternity and a good smile is very essential to survive in this industry. Dr. Goswami gave me a brand new dazzling smile. I visited him for the first time at Ruby general hospital and got my treatment done at his private clinic. He gave me many options too choose from, i decided to go for zirconia veneers for my 6 teeth. He has changed my looks completely. I can't express my joy in words. Thank you sir. You are great! Strongly recommend
